description: Main entry point of a Flutter application setting up top-level providers, initializing the app, and defining the root widget 'MyApp' with a scaffold for testing.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application providing a MaterialApp with a scaffold for testing.

classes.name: _ScaffoldForTests
classes.description: A stateless widget that provides a scaffold with an AppBar and a loading indicator, used for initial UI tests.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the corresponding widget.
